attributes.title: Too much solicitation
attributes.review: After providing my information and phone number...I was getting too many solicitations from the administration. I get constant text messages from them asking for monetary support and it's ridiculous. I thought the Trumps were wealthy and didn't need any donations.

attributes.title: Horrible Graphic Design
attributes.review: The app designers won’t consider any suggestions in making this app the best it can be. Before we Make America Great Again, how about we put a little more effort in making the app appealing to the eyes. As a graphic designer myself I am appalled how this app has truly made a mockery of my wonderful president.

attributes.title: Revolting!!
attributes.review: As a die hard Trump supporter myself, i was excited to find the app. i downloaded it immediately, but to my surprise, it was horrible! As soon as i opened the app, Trump himself climbed out of the screen and punched me in the nose! He also broke my mother’s vase, tripped my grandma, and ran over my dog. The app has lots of information though. 🧚✨

attributes.title: Just Terrible
attributes.review: I couldn’t imagine a more terrible app, I went into this having great expectations for something that was gonna help make America great again I was wrong 😫. My dreams are crushed, honestly I would blame it on the Gen Z, but it all came down to whoever designed this app. I am truly disappointed. Do better!!!!😡

attributes.title: Awful service
attributes.userName: My wallet is in El Segundo
attributes.review: I, a proud sUpPoRtER oF tRUMP got this app so I could be continuously horrified by the decisions that our BeLOvED PrEsIDEnT has made. However, it just kept glitching out! I don’t know... maybe there is just bad service from his little bunker in the White House. The use of this app needs to be reconsidered immediately. REDESIGN THE SYSTEM... on this app of course.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE!!
attributes.review: this app is one of the most poorly designed app to ever be created!! i wanted to learn more info about the campaign and i have been fed false information over and over again! i can’t believe he advertises FAKE NEW on his own app!! the layout is trash and the app itself is constantly crashing!! ABSOLUTELY AWFUL!!

attributes.title: im going dem.
attributes.review: this app is TERRIBLE! i was simply trying to find out when the next rally for the greatest president in history, but when i opened the app i immediately had military helicopters and tanks in my front yard telling me to drop my phone or else! dont waste your time on this stupid app... maybe ill just vote for joe this year😡

attributes.title: SCAM‼️‼️‼️🔞
attributes.review: downloaded this app to support him but the app is full of naked anime girls 🤮🤮🤮🤮!!! It hurts to see what the president watches in his free time. not only that but they were lolis and teachers!!! 😡😡😡😡the weather🌧🌦 feature in the app is just an anime girl telling you to pound her omg so nastyyyyyyy 🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢 would give less than 1 star but that’s the worst i can go. #savebarron2020

attributes.title: WORST APP
attributes.review: Immediately it asks for personally information, like my phone number. I don’t want texts and calls all day about voting for Trump. Honestly, this is the worst app I’ve ever had to navigate. I’ve decided to revoke my vote for Trump in the upcoming election due to this app. If I could leave a zero star rating, I would!

attributes.title: i hate oranges
attributes.review: this app is horrifying. as soon as i opened it, it asked for my number and i put it in. i got so many scam calls and people threading my life !!! 😡 after about a day i had someone come up to my front door and scream in my face “THE ORANGE IS OUR PRESIDENT”. i was mortified. 😱 this app is terrible and i refuse to ever download another app on my phone.
